items.title: Past
items.description1: I have been working as a Full Stack Engineer since the beginning of my career.
items.description2: As a Full Stack, my primary focus has been the frontend.
items.description3: I have built apps used by millions of users and that is something that has made me grow a lot as an engineer.

items.title: Present
items.description1: I am building different projects and improving my skills through practice and research, mainly on technologies that I'm interested in, e.g. Go.
items.description2: I am very interested in finding new technology stacks that allow me to build Full Stack apps with better performance, maintainability and developer experience.

items.title: Future
items.description1: I expect to continue being a proficient engineer, making the best use of the tools that come up with new AI advancements.
items.description2: I aim to be a 10x engineer.

items.title: Javascript
items.description1: I worked with Javascript a lot especially in the frontend.
items.description2: I've been using mainly Next (*React* metaframework) for more recent apps and Ember for legacy. Also meddled with jQuery, Angular and vanilla Javascript in times.

items.title: PHP
items.description1: About 75% of all web servers use PHP and inevitably most legacy code that I"ve worked on was in PHP.
items.description2: Namely with the frameworks Symfony, Code Igniter and Slim, following OOP principles.

items.title: Go
items.description1: Go is a language that I'm very interested on. In fact, this web site is built with Hugo, a Go framework to build SSG apps.
items.description2: In my experience, I worked with Go mainly for Web Services using Gin Gonic framework.
